name: Power Slaves
description:
Neo Pangaea, in the last few days of the Thanatocene, the far and away distant future. Humanity has failed to colonize space, and their time on Earth has run out. Civilization has descended into chaos and technology has largely reverted in the face of a massive energy crisis.

Credits:

Alex Carlson - Code/Art

Stevie Aristizábal - Words

Drew Hance - Sounds

Thanks To:

Krista McKullough, Joseph Jolton
